description:
New Steam Client update improves native Linux gaming, makes detection and passing of commands faster, and fixes multiple bugs. Here's what's new!

The post New Steam Client Update Improves Native Linux Gaming and Fixes Many Bugs appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: New Steam Client Update Improves Native Linux Gaming and Fixes Many Bugs

description:
KDE Plasma 6.2.3 desktop environment is now available with better support for HDR displays, as well as various bug fixes and improvements.

The post KDE Plasma 6.2.3 Brings Better Support for HDR Displays, Various Bug Fixes appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: KDE Plasma 6.2.3 Brings Better Support for HDR Displays, Various Bug Fixes

description:
LXQt 2.1 desktop environment is now available with initial Wayland support, as well as improvements to PCManFM-Qt, LXQt Panel, QTerminal, and more. Here's what's new!

The post LXQt 2.1 Desktop Environment Released with Experimental Wayland Session appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: LXQt 2.1 Desktop Environment Released with Experimental Wayland Session
